title: A pre-lithiation method for lithium metal anode protection
assignees: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

events.title: Application filed by Huazhong University of Science and Technology
events.assignee_search: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

classifications.description: Methods of deposition of the material by coating on electrode collectors
Composites in the form of layers, e.g. coatings

abstract: The invention belongs to the field of lithium batteries, and discloses a pre-lithiation method for lithium metal anode protection, which is characterized by comprising the following steps: (1) coating the surface of a current collector to form an organic polymer film; (2) coating The current collector covered with the organic polymer film is assembled into a battery together with the lithium sheet, the diaphragm and the electrolyte for discharge treatment, and metal lithium is deposited on the surface of the current collector; (3) The current collector with the metal lithium deposited on the surface is taken out, that is, to obtain A negative electrode material with a protective film on the surface that can be used in lithium metal batteries. The metal lithium negative electrode prepared by the pre-lithiation method of the present invention can suppress the generation of lithium dendrites on the one hand, and on the other hand, the protective film formed in situ can prevent the reaction between metal lithium and the electrolyte to generate dead lithium, which can effectively solve the problem of The phenomenon of lithium dendrites caused by the uneven deposition of conventional lithium metal anodes during cycling, and the phenomenon of dead lithium generated by the reaction of metal lithium anodes with electrolytes, thereby reducing the cycle performance.
abstract_original: 本发明属于锂电池领域，公开了一种用于锂金属负极保护的预锂化方法，其特征在于，包括以下步骤：(1)在集流体表面涂覆形成有机聚合物薄膜；(2)涂覆有有机聚合物薄膜的集流体与锂片、隔膜、电解液一起组装成电池进行放电处理，将金属锂沉积在集流体表面；(3)将表面沉积有金属锂的集流体取出，即得到表面具有保护膜的、且能够用于锂金属电池的负极材料。利用本发明的预锂化方法制备的金属锂负极，一方面能够抑制锂枝晶的产生，另一方面原位形成的保护膜又能阻止金属锂与电解液发生反应产生死锂，可有效解决常规金属锂负极在循环过程中的不均匀沉积产生的锂枝晶现象、以及金属锂负极与电解液反应产生的死锂从而降低循环性能的现象。
claims:
2. The prelithiation method for lithium metal negative electrode protection according to claim 1, wherein in step (1), the organic polymer used in the organic polymer thin film is one of oxidized polyacrylonitrile and vulcanized polyacrylonitrile;
      the current collector is made of copper foil.
3. The prelithiation method for lithium metal negative electrode protection as claimed in claim 1, wherein in step (1), said binder is polyvinylidene fluoride.

4. The prelithiation method for lithium metal negative electrode protection according to claim 1, wherein in step (1), the mass ratio of the organic polymer to the binder in the organic polymer thin film is 9: 1.

5. The prelithiation method for lithium metal negative electrode protection according to claim 1, wherein in step (1), the organic polymer thin film is formed by coating an organic polymer slurry on the surface of the current collector and then evaporating the solvent in the slurry; the solvent is one or more of water, N-methylpyrrolidone, tetrahydrofuran, N-dimethylformamide, dimethyl sulfoxide, thionyl chloride, chloroform and toluene.
6. The prelithiation method for lithium metal negative electrode protection as claimed in claim 5, wherein the solvent is N-methylpyrrolidone.
7. The prelithiation method for lithium metal negative electrode protection according to claim 1, wherein in step (1), the organic polymer thin film is applied to a thickness of 25 to 100 μm.
8. The prelithiation method for lithium metal negative electrode protection according to claim 1, wherein in step (2), the thickness of the lithium sheet is 10 to 1000 μm.
9. The prelithiation method for lithium metal negative electrode protection according to claim 8, wherein in step (2), the thickness of the lithium sheet is 100 to 500 μm.

10. The negative electrode material having a protective film on the surface and capable of being used for a lithium metal battery, which is obtained by the prelithiation method for lithium metal negative electrode protection according to any one of claims 1 to 9.

11. A lithium metal secondary battery comprising a positive electrode material, a negative electrode material, a separator and an electrolyte, wherein the negative electrode material is obtained by the prelithiation method for lithium metal negative electrode protection according to any one of claims 1 to 9;
      the positive electrode material is any one of an oxide positive electrode material, a sulfide positive electrode material, a lithium ion embedded positive electrode material, a sulfur positive electrode material, a sulfide polymer positive electrode material and an air positive electrode material.

12. The lithium metal secondary battery according to claim 11, wherein the separator is selected from the group consisting of a PP separator, a PE separator, a PP/PE/PP separator, and Al2O3Coating diaphragm, glass fiber diaphragm, PVDF diaphragm, PET/Al2O3One or more of a diaphragm, a cellulose diaphragm and an aramid diaphragm.
13. The lithium metal secondary battery according to claim 11, wherein the electrolyte is selected from an ether electrolyte, an ester electrolyte, or an ionic liquid electrolyte system.
